# sc health

**Description:** System health checks (features, all)

## Usage

```bash
sc health [action] [options]
```

## Options

| Option | Description |
|--------|-------------|
| `--quiet` | Show only summary |
| `--exit-code` | Exit with error code if issues found |
| `-v, --verbose` | Verbose output |
